unnormalised: The MoHFW guidelines recommend regular health checkups, particularly in light of recent spikes in H1N1 cases across MH; consult your local PHC for more info. As per the latest data released on 10/10/2024, 15% of the population in urban areas are at risk.
normalised: The M-o-H-F-W guidelines recommend regular health checkups, particularly in light of recent spikes in H-one-N-one cases across M-H; consult your local P-H-C for more info. As per the latest data released on tenth october two thousand and twenty four, fifteen percent of the population in urban areas are at risk.
